Text: Fordham Networkingall etrepreneurs Fordhams Office of Alumni Relations is sponsoring an At a DotCom Networking Night Thursday November th pm Fordhams Lincoln Center Campus West th Street th Flr There will be a panel of ebiz and web savvy alumni on hand to share their thoughts experiences and insight On hand will be alumni who are looking to break into cyberspace or are currently online that can share the experience with you For more information or to register for this event please contact Jose Gonzalez by replying to this email or sending an email to For more information on the event go to the Fordham University web site alumnialumnihtml If link does not work please copy and paste into browser

Fordham University Alumni Community Service Day April for something to do this Saturday Volunteer with fellow Fordham alumni and current students at Christmas in April in the Bronx Metro Chicago or Washington DC For information about Chicago please email Tim Cahill For information about Washington DC please email Kristi Daniels If you are interested in organizing a Christmas in April house in your area next year please contact me For more information about Christmas in April log on to wwwchristmasinaprilorg For information about the Bronx please read below To ensure a funfilled day please read the following carefully Please be at Jimmys Bronx Caf West Fordham Road at the corner of the Major Degan Bronx NY by AM on Saturday April th for registration and orientation Breakfast will be served tshirts distributed and all Christmas in AprilBronx volunteers will be there so it should be fun to see that we are part of a much larger effort For your convenience we will have a Ram Van that will pick up volunteers at AM at our Lincoln Center campus and then at approximately AM in front of the McGinley Center on our Rose Hill campus Transportation to our Christmas in April site will be provided at Jimmys Bronx Caf Lunch will be provided at our site Beverages and snacks will be provided at our site throughout the day Plan on being at our site until pm In some cases the work is completed earlier and in others later If you have any special dietary or medical needs it is your responsibility to ensure they are met Do not bring any valuables with you They will be your responsibility If you bring tools or other supplies with you they too are your responsibility The work is very messy and includes painting please dress accordingly Please feel free to bring additional volunteers with you all are welcome If you are interested in attending please email or call Betsy Boland so we will know how many volunteers to expect Our day volunteering for Christmas in April will surely be exciting fulfilling and rewarding Have a great time
